TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because it's very hard, and useless for a kraken to flip.

Why some people claim that the Earth is round, when you can just look at it and clearly see that it's flat?

Because of the small landscape you see

Why kerbals are "mostly" invincible?

Because slimes.

What is love?

Lima bean: a small bean.

Why do dogs eat?

Because yes.

Am I Groot?

I am Groot.

Space? SPACE?!

SSSSSSSSSSPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Wat is what.

What is the stuff that comprises doge, televisions, and antique picture frames.

is snipars illuminarty?

Snipars r illumatee.

Stop, imma cop!?

ok, but only if you stop too.

How does one smile?

No this is Patrick

What's the answer to the ultimate question?

I would say 42, but that would make too much sense. Instead, I'll say nothing. NOTHING.

Do it be like they say it is, or do it not be like they say it is?

Say do like the and stuff do what is yes or not does you

The moon is orbiting the sun, the earth is orbiting the moon and the sun is orbiting the earth right?

Yes but don't cut the strings holding them up.

Do Keurigs have elves inside that make the coffee?

No, elves don't have keurigs inside them that make coffee.

What is a walrus?

Obviously it is a wall composed of the strongest material known to anyone, rus.

What is the meaning of life......on mars?

To go where no man has gone before. These are the adventures of the Starship- huh? Wrong script? Ah, right... gotcha. Ok, here we go... [dramatic voice]The meaning of life on Mars boils down to two things: life... and Mars. What exactly that means is anyone's guess...[/dramatic voice] How was that take? Good? Awesome.

Are you wearing your brown pants?

my t-shirt is actually green

do you think quad-planes are a thing (like bi-plane just with 4 pairs)

Yes... I do like waffles:confused:

Do you like waffles?

yes i do have my brightness up all the way

are there purple reds?

Yes but only if green lets him.

If there grass that cuts itself?

Golf greens would go on strike.

Can airplanes make jello?

Only if Jello Kerman pilots the waffle plane

What's a walrus?

42.

Do you even bro, bro?

Cool stuff, bro...

Can you dig it?
